about_the_game:
HOWDY! You’ve just moved to Cicada Springs a modern small town with a slight southern twang to it! With only a few Bobo Bucks, and the clothes on your back you’ve decided to start your life fresh and start mingling with the townsfolk. You’ll find plenty of interesting women in town, but how you build their relationship with then will all depend on whose heart you want to win! How you play and the decisions you make will affect the affairs, stories, and (of course) waistlines of the five “main” characters!

Features
• Work or Walkaround: You’ve got to learn how to perfect your own personal work-life balance, there’s only so much time in each day, and many of the girls in town have expensive tastes
• Dialogue and Decisions. There are plenty of people to talk to in town, even if they aren’t datable. As you make friends with your new neighbors, and even sneak them some sweet treats now and then, you’ll build a relationship meter with them. They’ll go from friendly to slightly warming up to you, to possibly revealing some secrets about themselves (or some of their other friends…)

content_descriptors.notes: Characters use crude dialog during conversations including swears and some sexual innuendo.  Some characters clothes become slightly more revealing as game-play progresses but nothing overtly sexual.

name: Cicada Springs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or Greater
  • Processor: 2ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Spritework
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 805 MB available space

short_description: Explore a small town filled to the brim with (soon to be) BIG women! How will get along with the townsfolk in the biggest little city in the world!
